Title: Provides that one hundred percent of in-state sales of new lawn care devices shall be zero-emissions by two thousand twenty-seven
Summary: Provides that one hundred percent of in-state sales of new lawn care devices shall be zero-emissions by two thousand twenty-seven.
LawCode: Add ยง19-0329, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to providing that one hundred percent of in-state sales of new lawn care devices shall be zero-emissions by two thousand twenty-seven
